about_the_game:
The official soundtrack to the game "METAL DOGS" is now available on Steam!
In addition to 5 songs that have not been recorded in the Switch / PS4 version, a total of 12 songs including 7 carefully selected songs have been recorded.

* The lineup is different from the limited edition soundtrack released on Switch / PS4.

Please enjoy while looking back on the hot battle in the game "METAL DOGS".

[Contents]
Number of songs: 12 songs
Playing time: 48 minutes
Format: MP3
Music: Satoshi Kadokura, Kaya (ELFI)
